title: Man Follows Birds - Ali Khamrayev (1975)
description:
TITLE: Man Follows Birds / Chelovek ukhodit za ptitsami
DIRECTOR: Ali Khamrayev
YEAR:1975
CAST: Jahangir Faiziev
      Dilorom Kambarova
      Abdugani Saidov
      Nargis Avazova
      Melis Abzalov	

LANGUAGE: Russian
SUBTITLE: English (srt)	

Ã¢â‚¬Å“An enthralling movie that truly deserves the word 'visionary,' this stylistic tour de force by Uzbek master Ali Khamraev is almost unclassifiable Ã¢â‚¬â€ a mystic vision, an eastern Western, a pageant of colour and movement, a portrait of adolescence painted in broad, expressionistic strokes. A young boy gets a brutal sentimental education under the open skies of medieval Uzbekistan. Man Follows Birds moves from one sumptuous moment to the next Ã¢â‚¬â€ rides through ecstatically coloured landscapes, a trio of friends waking up covered in apple blossoms, the hero imagining his beautiful and long-dead mother in images that have an abstract power and beautyÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (adapted from Film Society of Lincoln Center). 

Ã¢â‚¬Å“Mind-bending ... Man Follows Birds merits comparison with Paradjanov ... Khamraev is a towering figure, a wizard with landscapes (they all seem charged, often enchanted) and an instinctual genius with actorsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ 
(Kent Jones, Film Comment). 

Ã¢â‚¬Å“A Paradjanovian medieval pageant of boyhood under primal pressure ... Man Follows Birds is where the Uzbek art-film heritage truly beginsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ 
(Michael Atkinson, Village Voice).

Thanks to the original uploader, Andrasz. Rip by iriston.
